CHAT.comment: Freeplay. This is not the child's mother. It is the mother's sister. The child has been left in the sister's custody for 2 months. The sister reports the child was not talking at all before she took custody. Child and Mother sit on floor playing with box of experimenter provided toys. First they play with a truck with shapes and then with a miniature play+ground set. Child is somewhat intelligible.

u.a: has been trying to put shape in a hole; whines , turns truck to door .
grunts; struggles to open door on truck .
gives truck back to Child with the door now open .
whisper; gazes to inside of truck .
puts shapes rapidly in through door of truck .
starts to shut door with some shapes still on floor .
gives up on door and dumps shapes out on floor with a clatter .
Mother gets door to truck closed .
Mother is expressing excitement about Child's accomplishment .
tries to put in and then succeeds .
gives truck to Child and turns to toy box .
removes box with play+ground set in it .
examines contents of miniature play+ground box .
is playing with a different toy .
gaze box as Mother moves it; simultaneous .
takes figure and places in shapes truck; not watching Mother .
Mother plays with figure and hat .
puts another piece in shapes truck .
shakes head; puts another piece in shapes truck .
gets out another part of the merry+go+round .
turns to another figure by the merry+go+round .
places man in chair on merry+go+round .
lays a new figure on merry+go+round .
works at merry+go+round; response seems automatic .
picks up figure and starts to place in truck .
wants Child to spin merry+go+round again .
receives figure and starts to place purse on it .
poises figure a top of slide .
